w/yellow crown band row 1 chain 11 beginning in 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet 10 10 sts row 2 chain 1 & turn single_crochet in each st across 10 sts crown spikes row 3 chain 5 & turn * slip_stitch into 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet into next chain half_double_crochet into next chain double_crochet into last chain * skip first 2 sts of crown band slip_stitch into next st chain 7 slip_stitch into 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet into next chain half_double_crochet into next chain double_crochet into next chain edc into next chain treble_crochet into last chain skip next 3 sts of crown band slip_stitch into next st chain 5 repeat from * to * 1x skip next 2 sts & slip_stitch into last st of crown band fo yellow leaving an 18-inch tail for sewing to back
